Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Xac-1 (XXA; Leu-rich; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence of this peptide shows 52% similarity tofish NRC-15.  Molecular formula:   C96H162N24O18; Mol Wt 1940.485; GRAVY= 0.94; Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity of the peptide:  -0.79   kcal/mol.Activity: Active against E. coli NBRC 14237 (MIC 3.1 uM), S. aureus NBRC 12732 (MIC 1.6 uM), M. luteus NBRC 12708 (3.1 uM), S. cerevisiae NBRC 10217 (MIC 6.2 uM).Toxicity:  hemolytic 37.5% at 100 uM, HC50>100 uM. histamine releasing 58% at 10 uM. The peptide is disordered in aqueous solution but helical in 50% TFE (CD). Updated 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Kawakami H, Goto SG, Murata K, Matsuda H, Shigeri Y, Imura T, Inagaki H, Shinada T.2017
Literature Information.Reference: J Venom Anim Toxins Incl Trop Dis. 2017 May 23;23:29. doi: 10.1186/s40409-017-0119-6.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: Isolation of biologically active peptides from the venom of Japanese carpenter bee, Xylocopa appendiculata
